meanings.definition: The quality or state of being yucky.
meanings.sent1: The yuckinesses of the slimy food made me feel queasy.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand the yuckinesses of dirty dishes in the sink.
meanings.sent3: The yuckinesses of the situation made us all laugh nervously.
meanings.sent4: The yuckinesses of the old pond water was like a swamp in a cup.
meanings.sent5: The yuckinesses of the garbage dump lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: Things that are unpleasant or disgusting.
meanings.sent1: The fridge was full of yuckinesses that needed to be thrown out.
meanings.sent2: She avoided touching the yuckinesses on the public restroom door.
meanings.sent3: The yuckinesses of the prank made everyone cringe and giggle.
meanings.sent4: The yuckinesses of the situation were like a cloud of bad smells.
meanings.sent5: The yuckinesses of the spoiled milk was unbearable.
